title: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When using the code assist feature, the file appears to be marked as dirtied even though no actual changes have been made. Additionally, the code assist functionality does not appear.
EB: The file should not be marked as dirtied when code assist is used without making any changes. The code assist functionality should appear as expected.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open a file in the code editor.
2. Enable code assist.
3. Use the code assist feature without making any changes.
4. Observe that the file is marked as dirty, even though no changes were made. 
5. Observe that the code assist functionality does not appear.
